MUTATION_PROBABILITY.desc: Probability that a mutation occurs during a mutation phase

NETWORK_SIZE_IMPORTANCE_TO_FITNESS.desc: Importance of the network size to compute the fitness of an individual, the more this value, the less network size is important

TRAINING_STEPS.desc: Number of training steps per individual (default: 600)

N_BEST_CANDIDATES.desc: Number of best candidates that will constitute a major basis of the next generation

MAX_BREEDING_ATTEMPTS.desc: Maximum number of breeding attemps between two parents

EVALUATION_RATE.desc: Number of steps before evaluating the network performances (default: 5)

LINEAR.desc: Representation of the linear activation function (Vertex)

RELU.desc: Representation of the ReLu activation function (Vertex)

NO_BATCH_NORMALIZATION.desc: Representation of not performing a batch normalization on the input edges (Vertex)

USE_BATCH_NORMALIZATION.desc: Representation of performing a batch normalization on the input edges (Vertex)

NO_MAX_POOLING.desc: Representation of not performing a max pooling on the input edges (Vertex)

USE_MAX_POOLING.desc: Representation of performing a max pooling on the input edges (Vertex)

DEFAULT_POOLING_SHAPE.desc: Default kernel shape for pooling layers (Edge)

NO_DROPOUT.desc: Representation of not performing a dropout normalization on the input edges (Vertex)

USE_DROPOUT.desc: Representation of performing a dropout normalization on the input edges (Vertex)

NO_FLATTEN.desc: Representation of not performing a flatten operation on the input edges (Vertex)

FLATTEN.desc: Representation of performing a flatten operation on the input edges (Vertex)

NO_ACTION.desc: Representation of not performing an action on the input edges (Vertex)

SUM.desc: Representation of performing a sum of the input edges (Vertex)

CONCATENATION.desc: Representation of performing a concatenation of the input edges (Vertex)

FULLY_CONNECTED.desc: Representation of a fully connected layer (Edge)

DEFAULT_UNITS.desc: Default units for fully connected layers (Edge)

ALLOWED_UNITS.desc: Allowed units for fully connected layers (Edge)

DEFAULT_KERNEL_SHAPE.desc: Default kernel shape for convolutional layers (Edge)

INPUT_SHAPE.desc: Shape of the neural network input

OUTPUT_SHAPE.desc: Shape of the neural network output

DROPOUT_RATE.desc: Dropout rate of the Dropout layers

MINIBATCH_SIZE.desc: Number of training cases over which each stochastic gradient descent (SGD) update is computed
